recipes.label: 命令我的船员
recipes.startdescription: 体现领导能力的时候到了。这种时候任何一个船员的失败都可能导致任务失败。我可以选择唤起象征平衡的冬之力，也可以唤起象征抗争的刃之力。
recipes.description: 体现领导能力的时候到了。这种时候任何一个船员的失败都可能导致任务失败。我可以选择唤起象征平衡的冬之力，也可以唤起象征抗争的刃之力。

slots.label: 协助
slots.description: 器具可用于实现我之目标。

recipes.label: Auroral Authority
recipes.startdescription: Conducted to my command, my ship is as certain  as rhyme and as unstuppable as dawns advances. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Wordless Authority
recipes.startdescription: I need not speak, just a glance and the crew falls into place. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Quiet Authority
recipes.startdescription: If I cannot be unbalanced, so too can my crew not get flustered. We may yet succeed

recipes.label: Venerated Command
recipes.startdescription: They cannot hesitate. If they all act with my intent, our ship will turn into a creature with unbridled ferocity. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Unifying Command
recipes.startdescription: They cannot doubt me, if they are to be my many limbs. And the dosen arms of my body are storng, and growing stronger still. We will likely succed.

recipes.label: Fierce Command
recipes.startdescription: Not a moment my crew can question me. Together, we will conquer hell and high water. We may yet succeed
